briefdescription.para: Built-in preset types for item generation.

detaileddescription.para: Each preset provides different world context and flavor text for LLM prompts.

briefdescription.para: Builds prompts for LLM item generation.

detaileddescription.para:
Haneul Lee (Rundee)
2025-11-15
Copyright (c) 2025 Haneul Lee. All rights reserved.
Provides methods to build structured prompts for LLM item generation. Supports both built-in presets and custom presets for different game worlds.
